reference.title: Attributes
reference.shortdesc: The Attributes appendix contains definitions about commonly used attributes, with common definitions.

section.p: If an element uses a different definition, or narrows the scope of, an otherwise common attribute, it will be called out in the topic that defines the element.

note.p: The content in this appendix is copied from the base DITA specification. Any comments or corrections about this content should be directed to the DITA Technical Specification Editor.
